button.title: Button
button.description: This node is triggered when the button is pressed.

started.title: Resource usage started
started.description: This node is triggered when a resource is started.

stopped.title: Resource usage stopped
stopped.description: This node is triggered when a resource is stopped.

takeover.title: Resource usage takeover
takeover.description: This node is triggered when a resource is taken over.

locked.title: Door locked
locked.description: This node is triggered when the door is locked.

unlocked.title: Door unlocked
unlocked.description: This node is triggered when the door is unlocked.

unlatched.title: Door unlatched
unlatched.description: This node is triggered when the door is unlatched.

if.title: If
if.description: If a value matches a comparison operator, the true-output is triggered, otherwise the false-output.

wait.title: Wait
wait.description: This node waits for a certain time.

sendRequest.title: Send HTTP request
sendRequest.description: This node sends a HTTP request.

sendMessage.title: MQTT message send
sendMessage.description: This node sends a MQTT message.

unsupportedForResourceType: This node is unsupported for the current resource type and will never run.
